author: Tim Hardwick
title: Apple Music Classical Comes to iPad
description:
Apple Music Classical was updated on the App Store today and extends availability beyond iPhone and Android to bring it to iPads for the first time (via 9to5Mac). Apple released Apple Music Classical on the Google Play Store in March.
